keyMappings:
unmap `
unmap m
unmap [
unmap ]
map [ goBack
map ] goForward
map <tab> visitPreviousTab
map R reload hard

map gh toggleHUD
map gd openDevTools
unmap b
unmap B
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map O Vomnibar.activate
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map H moveTabLeft
map L moveTabRight

map ge scrollToBottom
map gh firstTab

map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map <A-1> firstTab
map <A-2> firstTab count=2
map <A-3> firstTab count=3
map <A-4> firstTab count=4
map <A-5> firstTab count=5
map <A-6> firstTab count=6
map <A-7> firstTab count=7
map <A-8> firstTab count=8
map <A-9> firstTab count=9
map <A-0> firstTab count=20
searchEngines:
b: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave
g: https://www.google.ie/search?q=%s Google
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?ia=about&q=%s DuckDuckGo
ph: https://www.phind.com/search?q=%s Phind
pe: https://www.perplexity.ai/search?focus=internet&q=%s Perplexity

y: http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
m: https://www.google.ie/maps?q=%s Google maps
i: https://google.com/images?q=%s Search Images

w: http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
s: http://www.amazon.in/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
a: https://hianime.to/search?keyword=%s Anime
